snippet.title: Trial by Teng: A Twilight Path Adventure - Gameplay Trailer [PC VR]
snippet.description:
Gameplay trailer for Trial by Teng: A Twilight Path Adventure, a beautiful and surreal virtual reality adventure set in a delightfully offbeat vision of the afterlife. The game is being developed by Charm Games and will be released for HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and Valve Index in 2020. You can find more information, as well as reviews and ratings here: https://vrgamecritic.com/game/trial-by-teng-a-twilight-path-adventure

► Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/vrgamecritic?sub_confirmation=1
► Like: https://www.facebook.com/vrgamecritic
► Follow: https://twitter.com/vrgamecritic
